snippet.name: styleclassselector
snippet.starttext: <seform:styleclassselector id="$${id}" label="$${label:Class}" required="$${required:no|yes}" arrange="$${arrange:horizontal:vertical}" rowid="$${rowid}" labelclass="$${labelclass}" labelstyle="$${labelstyle}" fieldclass="$${fieldclass}" fieldstyle="$${fieldstyle}" value="$${value:#formData[id]#}" stylesheetversionid="$${stylesheetversionid}" ssid="$${ssid}" ssvid="$${ssvid}" elementlist="$${elementlist}" universalclassonly="$${universalclassonly}" note="$${note}" />
